InlineMeasurements.annotation: Lots of tasks to initialize colorvecs, write and read them as well as propagators. The create_colorvecs below is the task that produces vectors that are actually used.

elem.annotation: Make a fake unit subset_vectors struct
elem.Name: GAUSSIAN_INIT_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes, write and erase this object.
elem.Name: QIO_WRITE_ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes, erase this object.
elem.Name: ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: Make a fake gaussian subset_vectors struct
elem.Name: GAUSSIAN_INIT_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes, erase this object.
elem.Name: ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: Make a fake gaussian map object holding propagator solutions
elem.Name: GAUSSIAN_INIT_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes, write and erase this object.
elem.Name: QIO_WRITE_ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes, erase this object.
elem.Name: ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

InlineMeasurements.annotation:
This task will read eigevectors produced by chroma_eig/laplace_eigs . Not used in this test, instead use create colorvecs below.
EIGENINFO_LIME_COLORVEC_READ_NAMED_OBJECT
/scratch/10000/szscl21_16_128_b1p50_t_x4p300_um0p0840_sm0p0743_n1p265_per.eigs_vec0.lime /scratch/10000/szscl21_16_128_b1p50_t_x4p300_um0p0840_sm0p0743_n1p265_per.eigs_vec1.lime /scratch/10000/szscl21_16_128_b1p50_t_x4p300_um0p0840_sm0p0743_n1p265_per.eigs_vec2.lime
eigeninfo_0

elem.annotation: Iterate the smearing operator to produce near eigenvectors
elem.Name: CREATE_COLORVECS
